item.title: Configuration for CS:GO, Overwatch, etc
item.description: Posting my settings here in case I lose them or want to reference on another machine. Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) Client Cvars sensitivity 1.25; closeonbuy 1; viewmodel_presetpos 3; cl_autowepswitch 0; net_graph 1; bind mwheelup +jump; bind mwheeldown +jump; apply_crosshair_code CSGO-koN4E-pSyUU-eZ6WC-5PP9a-5WRZQ; Crosshair for reference Overwatch Fortnite Mouse Mouse: G604 DPI: 1600 Polling rate: 1000
